title: NVIDIA Corp. stock rises Thursday, outperforms market
text:
Shares of NVIDIA Corp. 
        NVDA,
        +0.12%
       rallied 1.18% to $914.35 Thursday, on what proved to be an all-around positive trading session for the stock market, with the S&P 500 Index 
        SPX,
        +0.11%
       rising 0.32% to 5,241.53 and the Dow Jones Industrial Average 
        DJIA,
        +0.12%
       rising 0.68% to 39,781.37. This was the stock's fourth consecutive day of gains. NVIDIA Corp. closed $59.65 short of its 52-week high ($974.00), which the company reached on March 8th. Trading volume (47.7 M) remained 7.7 million below its 50-day average volume of 55.4 M.
